languages.text: "Проктор". {n}Лицо наместника становится непроницаемым.{/n} "Слышал о гибели Саргоны и об успешном возвращении десятины Райкада Минорис. Вам снова нужны какие-либо сведения о нарушителях Лекс Империалис? Уверяю вас, Саргона был единственным столь злостным преступником на Футфолле".

"Proctor." {n}The Liege's face takes on a most dispassionate expression.{/n} "I heard about Sargona's death and the successful reclamation of the tithe from Rykad Minoris. Do you require more information on any violators of the Lex Imperialis? I assure you, Sargona was the only heinous criminal of this calibre on all of Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Проктор". {n}Лицо наместника становится непроницаемым.{/n} "Слышал о гибели Саргоны и об успешном возвращении десятины Райкада Минорис. Вам снова нужны какие-либо сведения о нарушителях Лекс Империалис? Уверяю вас, Саргона был единственным столь злостным преступником на Футфолле".

Do you require more information on any violators of the Lex Imperialis? I assure you, Sargona was the only heinous criminal of this calibre on all of Footfall."

Do you require more information on any violators of the Lex Imperialis? I assure you, Sargona was the only heinous criminal of this calibre on all of Footfall."

languages.text: “监察官。”{n}总督脸上没有一丝表情。{/n}“我听说萨戈纳死了，法务部顺利收回了小莱卡德的什一税。不知您是否需要其他罪犯的相关资料？我可以向您保证，整个落脚港里，萨戈纳是唯一一个犯下如此恶行的罪犯。”
languages.original_text: "Proctor." {n}The Liege's face takes on a most dispassionate expression.{/n} "I heard about Sargona's death and the successful reclamation of the tithe from Rykad Minoris. Do you require more information on any violators of the Lex Imperialis? I assure you, Sargona was the only heinous criminal of this calibre on all of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “监察官。”{n}总督脸上没有一丝表情。{/n}“我听说萨戈纳死了，法务部顺利收回了小莱卡德的什一税。不知您是否需要其他罪犯的相关资料？我可以向您保证，整个落脚港里，萨戈纳是唯一一个犯下如此恶行的罪犯。”

languages.text: «Procurador». {n}El rostro del Señor adopta una expresión extremadamente indiferente.{/n} «Me he enterado de la muerte de Sargona y de la recuperación del diezmo de Rykad Minoris. ¿Necesita más información sobre otras violaciones de la Lex Imperialis? Le aseguro que Sargona era el único criminal de ese calibre en todo Paso».
languages.original_text: "Proctor." {n}The Liege's face takes on a most dispassionate expression.{/n} "I heard about Sargona's death and the successful reclamation of the tithe from Rykad Minoris. Do you require more information on any violators of the Lex Imperialis? I assure you, Sargona was the only heinous criminal of this calibre on all of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «Procurador». {n}El rostro del Señor adopta una expresión extremadamente indiferente.{/n} «Me he enterado de la muerte de Sargona y de la recuperación del diezmo de Rykad Minoris. ¿Necesita más información sobre otras violaciones de la Lex Imperialis? Le aseguro que Sargona era el único criminal de ese calibre en todo Paso».

languages.text: « Proctor. » {n}Le visage du suzerain n'affiche pas l'ombre de la moindre expression.{/n} « J'ai entendu parler de la mort de Sargona et de la récupération de la dîme de Rykad Minoris. Souhaitez-vous davantage d'informations concernant d'autres contrevenants à la Lex Imperialis ? Je vous l'assure, Sargona était le seul criminel de ce calibre sur Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Proctor." {n}The Liege's face takes on a most dispassionate expression.{/n} "I heard about Sargona's death and the successful reclamation of the tithe from Rykad Minoris. Do you require more information on any violators of the Lex Imperialis? I assure you, Sargona was the only heinous criminal of this calibre on all of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « Proctor. » {n}Le visage du suzerain n'affiche pas l'ombre de la moindre expression.{/n} « J'ai entendu parler de la mort de Sargona et de la récupération de la dîme de Rykad Minoris. Souhaitez-vous davantage d'informations concernant d'autres contrevenants à la Lex Imperialis ? Je vous l'assure, Sargona était le seul criminel de ce calibre sur Castel. »

languages.text: 「代理人」{n}領主はつとめて冷静な表情を浮かべた。{/n}「サルゴナの死とライカド・ミノリスから租税を回収できたことについては聞いた。レックス・インペリア違反者に関して、さらに情報が必要か？断言するが、サルゴナほどの凶悪犯はフットフォール全体で彼だけだ」
languages.original_text: "Proctor." {n}The Liege's face takes on a most dispassionate expression.{/n} "I heard about Sargona's death and the successful reclamation of the tithe from Rykad Minoris. Do you require more information on any violators of the Lex Imperialis? I assure you, Sargona was the only heinous criminal of this calibre on all of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「代理人」{n}領主はつとめて冷静な表情を浮かべた。{/n}「サルゴナの死とライカド・ミノリスから租税を回収できたことについては聞いた。レックス・インペリア違反者に関して、さらに情報が必要か？断言するが、サルゴナほどの凶悪犯はフットフォール全体で彼だけだ」

languages.text: "Üsteğmen." {n}Emîr'in yüzünde duygusuz bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "Sargona'nın ölümünü ve Rykad Minoris'ten başarıyla geri aldığınız aşarı duydum. Lex İmperialis ihlalcileri hakkında daha fazla bilgiye ihtiyacınız var mı? Sizi temin ederim ki Sargona, Binliman'daki bu seviyede iğrenç tek suçluydu."
languages.original_text: "Proctor." {n}The Liege's face takes on a most dispassionate expression.{/n} "I heard about Sargona's death and the successful reclamation of the tithe from Rykad Minoris. Do you require more information on any violators of the Lex Imperialis? I assure you, Sargona was the only heinous criminal of this calibre on all of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen." {n}Emîr'in yüzünde duygusuz bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "Sargona'nın ölümünü ve Rykad Minoris'ten başarıyla geri aldığınız aşarı duydum. Lex Imperialis ihlalcileri hakkında daha fazla bilgiye ihtiyacınız var mı? Sizi temin ederim ki Sargona, Binliman'daki bu seviyede iğrenç tek suçluydu."

languages.text: "Proktor!" {n}Das Gesicht des Lehnsherrn nimmt einen völlig leidenschaftslosen Ausdruck an.{/n} "Ich habe von Sargonas Tod und der erfolgreichen Wiederbeschaffung des Zehnts von Rykad Minoris gehört. Benötigt Ihr mehr Informationen über irgendwelche Gesetzesbrecher des Lex Imperia? Ich versichere Euch, Sargona war der einzige Schwerverbrecher dieses Kalibers auf ganz Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Proctor." {n}The Liege's face takes on a most dispassionate expression.{/n} "I heard about Sargona's death and the successful reclamation of the tithe from Rykad Minoris. Do you require more information on any violators of the Lex Imperialis? I assure you, Sargona was the only heinous criminal of this calibre on all of Footfall."

Benötigt Ihr mehr Informationen über irgendwelche Gesetzesbrecher des Lex Imperia? Ich versichere Euch, Sargona war der einzige Schwerverbrecher dieses Kalibers auf ganz Footfall."
